name: qwebs-starter-kit-react-native
description: Starter kit to create an API for react native application with Qwebs server.

scripts.test-cover: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/jasmine-node/bin/jasmine-node --captureExceptions tests && cat coverage/lcov.info | node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf coverage
